description:

Subscribe for more Pitch Meetings: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Kq-yEt1iYsbUzNOoIRK0g

0:00 Pinocchio (2022)
5:40 Live Action Mulan
11:15 Cruella 
17:53 The Little Mermaid (2023)
